00031 template <class Product>
00032 class TSupplierCompWrap:
00033                      public ilog::CLoggerComponentBase,
00034                      virtual public ISupplier,
00035                      virtual public istd::IChangeable,
00036                      virtual protected ilog::IMessageConsumer
00037 {
00038 public:
00039        typedef ilog::CLoggerComponentBase BaseClass;
00040        typedef Product ProductType;
00041 
00042        enum MessageId
00043        {
00044               MI_DURATION_TIME = 0x077a1b
00045        };
00046 
00047        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TSupplierCompWrap);
00048               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(ISupplier);
00049               I_ASSIGN(m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr, "DiagnosticName", "Name of this supplier for diagnostic, if it is not set, no diagnostic log message will be send", false, "");
00050               I_ASSIGN(m_paramsSetCompPtr, "ParamsSet", "Parameters set describing model parameter used to produce results", false, "ParamsSet");
00051               I_ASSIGN_TO(m_paramsSetModelCompPtr, m_paramsSetCompPtr, false);
00052               I_ASSIGN_MULTI_0(m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr, "AdditionalTriggerInputs", "Additional observed trigger inputs, the supplier will be invalidated if some input signal the change", false);
00053        I_END_COMPONENT;

00186 template <class Product>
00187 TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::TSupplierCompWrap()
00188 :      m_workStatus(WS_INVALID),
00189        m_inputsObserver(this),
00190        m_paramsObserver(this),
00191        m_productChangeNotifier(NULL, CF_SUPPLIER_RESULTS | CF_MODEL),
00192        m_areParametersValid(false)
00193 {
00194 }

00199 template <class Product>
00200 int TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetWorkStatus() const
00201 {
00202        return m_workStatus;

00205 
00206 template <class Product>
00207 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::InvalidateSupplier()
00208 {
00209        if (m_workStatus >= WS_OK){
00210               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(this);
00211 
00212               m_workStatus = WS_INVALID;
00213        }
00214 }
00215 
00216 
00217 template <class Product>
00218 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkInitialized()
00219 {
00220        if (m_workStatus < WS_INIT){
00221               m_messageContainer.ClearMessages();
00222 
00223               // distribute initializing to input...
00224               for (         InputSuppliersMap::ConstIterator inputSupplierIter = m_inputSuppliersMap.constBegin();
00225                                    inputSupplierIter != m_inputSuppliersMap.constEnd();
00226                                    ++inputSupplierIter){
00227                      ISupplier* supplierPtr = inputSupplierIter.value();
00228 
00229                      supplierPtr->EnsureWorkInitialized();
00230               }
00231 
00232               m_productChangeNotifier.SetPtr(this);
00233 
00234               if (!m_areParametersValid){
00235                      OnParametersChanged();
00236 
00237                      m_areParametersValid = true;
00238               }
00239 
00240               if (InitializeWork()){
00241                      m_workStatus = WS_INIT;
00242               }
00243               else{
00244                      m_workStatus = WS_CRITICAL;
00245               }
00246        }
00247 }
00248 
00249 
00250 template <class Product>
00251 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::EnsureWorkFinished()
00252 {
00253        if (m_workStatus == WS_INIT){
00254               m_workStatus = WS_LOCKED;
00255 
00256               if (!m_productPtr.IsValid()){
00257                      m_productPtr.SetPtr(new Product());
00258               }
00259 
00260               m_workStatus = ProduceObject(*m_productPtr);
00261               Q_ASSERT(m_workStatus >= WS_OK);   // No initial states are possible
00262 
00263               m_productChangeNotifier.Reset();
00264        }
00265 }
00266 
00267 
00268 template <class Product>
00269 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::ClearWorkResults()
00270 {
00271        if (m_workStatus == WS_LOCKED){
00272               return;
00273        }
00274 
00275        m_workStatus = WS_INVALID;
00276        
00277        m_messageContainer.ClearMessages();
00278 
00279        m_productPtr.Reset();
00280 
00281        m_productChangeNotifier.Reset();
00282 }
00283

00287 {
00288        return &m_messageContainer;
00289 }

00314 template <class Product>
00315 const Product* TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::GetWorkProduct() const
00316 {
00317        const_cast< TSupplierCompWrap<Product>* >(this)->EnsureWorkFinished();
00318 
00319        if (m_workStatus <= WS_OK){
00320               return m_productPtr.GetPtr();
00321        }
00322        else{
00323               return NULL;
00324        }
00325 }

00327 
00328 template <class Product>
00329 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::RegisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr, ISupplier* supplierPtr)
00330 {
00331        Q_ASSERT(modelPtr != NULL);
00332 
00333        modelPtr->AttachObserver(&m_inputsObserver);
00334 
00335        if (supplierPtr != NULL){
00336               m_inputSuppliersMap[modelPtr] = supplierPtr;
00337        }
00338 }
00339 
00340 
00341 template <class Product>
00342 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::UnregisterSupplierInput(imod::IModel* modelPtr)
00343 {
00344        Q_ASSERT(modelPtr != NULL);
00345        if (m_inputsObserver.IsModelAttached(modelPtr)){
00346               modelPtr->DetachObserver(&m_inputsObserver);
00347        }
00348 
00349        m_inputSuppliersMap.remove(modelPtr);
00350 }
00351 
00352 
00353 template <class Product>
00354 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::AddMessage(const ilog::CMessage* messagePtr) const
00355 {
00356        Q_ASSERT(messagePtr != NULL);
00357 
00358        m_messageContainer.AddMessage((const istd::TSmartPtr<const istd::IInformationProvider>)messagePtr);
00359 }

00362 // reimplemented (ilog::IMessageConsumer)

00364 bool TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::IsMessageSupported(
00365                      int messageCategory,

00367                      const istd::IInformationProvider* messagePtr) const
00368 {

00380 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00381 
00382 template <class Product>
00383 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::OnComponentCreated()
00384 {
00385        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00386 
00387        m_productChangeNotifier.Reset();
00388 
00389        if (m_paramsSetModelCompPtr.IsValid()){
00390               m_paramsSetModelCompPtr->AttachObserver(&m_paramsObserver);
00391        }
00392 
00393        int inputsCount = m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr.GetCount();
00394        for (int i = 0; i < inputsCount; ++i){
00395               imod::IModel* inputModelPtr = m_additionalTriggerInputsCompPtr[i];
00396               if (inputModelPtr != NULL){
00397                      RegisterSupplierInput(inputModelPtr);
00398               }
00399        }
00400 
00401        m_workStatus = WS_INVALID;
00402 }
00403 
00404 
00405 template <class Product>
00406 void TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::OnComponentDestroyed()
00407 {
00408        m_inputsObserver.EnsureModelsDetached();
00409        m_paramsObserver.EnsureModelsDetached();
00410 
00411        m_productChangeNotifier.Abort();
00412 
00413        BaseClass::OnComponentDestroyed();
00414 }

00417 // public methods of embedded class Timer

00419 template <class Product>
00420 TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::Timer::Timer(const TSupplierCompWrap* parentPtr, const QString& measuredFeatureName)
00421 :      m_parentPtr(parentPtr), m_measuredFeatureName(measuredFeatureName)
00422 {
00423     m_timer.Start();
00424 }
00425 
00426 
00427 template <class Product>
00428 TSupplierCompWrap<Product>::Timer::~Timer()
00429 {
00430        if ((m_parentPtr != NULL) && (m_parentPtr->m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr.IsValid())){
00431               MessagePtr messagePtr(new ilog::CMessage(
00432                                    istd::IInformationProvider::IC_INFO,
00433                                    0,
00434                     QObject::tr("%1 took %2 ms").arg(m_measuredFeatureName).arg(m_timer.GetElapsed() * 1000),
00435                                    *m_parentPtr->m_diagnosticNameAttrPtr));
00436               m_parentPtr->m_messageContainer.AddMessage(messagePtr);
00437        }
00438 }
